DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine vaginal residence time certain semen biomarkers .
DOC.detailed_description: The study take approximately 2-3 month complete . First , screen see eligible study . At visit male partner give medical history ask donate semen sample analysis , female give medical history , receive physical exam , pelvic exam , pregnancy test , test vaginal infection include Gonorrhea/Chlamydia . If eligible ( couple ) , call randomize one four study group . You allow choose whether want take certain sample home , take nurse clinic . At point either ask return home sexual intercourse , male partner ask donate semen sample , inserted female 's vagina . Depending group , next ask return clinic either 4 7 time next 2 week vaginal swab . Once complete main study , offer opportunity participate substudy , repeat visit , except chose sample take clinic main study , take certain sample home substudy . If chose take certain sample home main study , sample take clinic substudy . Also , need another screen visit start substudy within 9 week end main study .
DOC.criteria: Heterosexual , monogamous couple Must use birth control tubal ligation Must least 18 year old , healthy ( female ) Must 1855 year old , healthy ( male ) History hysterectomy ( female ) History vasectomy ( male ) Drug alcohol abuse
